name: Rell
title: the Iron Maiden
shortBio: The product of brutal experimentation at the hands of the Black Rose, Rell is a defiant, living weapon determined to topple Noxus. Her childhood was one of misery and horror, enduring unspeakable procedures to perfect and weaponize her magical control over metal... until she staged a violent escape, killing many of her captors in the process. Now branded as a criminal, Rell attacks Noxian soldiers on sight as she searches for survivors of her old “academy,” defending the meek while delivering violent death to her former overseers.

skins.name: Battle Queen Rell

chromas.name: Battle Queen Rell (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.name: Battle Queen Rell (Coronation)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Battle Queens event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Battle Queens event.

skins.description: A young woman from the magic-starved Queendom of Calamity, volunteered for the coronation by a shadowy cabal of aristocrats after a series of magical experiments. Having now won the crown and the power of her crest, Rell has discovered her powers were stolen from the people of her country, and she has vowed revenge on her puppeteers.

skins.name: Star Guardian Rell

chromas.name: Star Guardian Rell (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.name: Star Guardian Rell (Brilliant)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Star Guardian event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Star Guardian event.

skins.description: Hailing from a sister city along with Quinn, Rell is a delinquent loner who does what she wants, when she wants, and avoids making friends by pushing everyone away. In battle she rides atop her mighty steed Sebastien, her simmering rage transforming her into a starlit knight who defends the meek from harm.

skins.name: High Noon Rell

chromas.name: High Noon Rell (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.name: High Noon Rell (Noonday)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 High Noon event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 High Noon event.

skins.description: Rell ran as her home rotted away at the Fifth Harbinger's hands, but the young Powder Witch ain't running now. She squares her shoulders and swings into the saddle of a horse made of magic, steam, and fire. From its back, she looks down at the haunted gunslinger. “Come on, old man. We got a second chance, I ain't gonna waste it.”

skins.name: Grand Reckoning Rell
skins.description: In training, Rell was told that the arena is unforgiving. On the sand, you couldn't rely on anyone but yourself, and maybe your mount… if you could stay in the saddle. But if you let it, that brutal world inside the arena would cut you, bleed you, strike you down. Reckonings were built on blood and iron, forged in the fire of conflict—but so was she.

passive.name: Break the Mold
passive.description: Rell's Attacks and Abilities deal additional magic damage and steal Armor and Magic Resist on hit.

spells.name: Shattering Strike
spells.description: Rell deals magic damage to units in a line, breaking their shields and stunning them.
spells.dynamicDescription: Rell thrusts her lance, <status>Stunning</status> targets for @StunDuration@ seconds, destroying all <shield>Shields</shield>, and dealing <magicDamage>@Damage@ magic damage.</magicDamage>@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Ferromancy: Crash Down
spells.description:
Mounted: Rell Dismounts, crashing down in her armor, Knocking enemies up and gaining a large Shield. While dismounted, she gains Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Speed, and Attack Range, but is Slowed.

Dismounted: Rell forms her Mount, gaining a burst of speed and Knocking Up the next enemy she attacks.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive - Mounted Alacrity: Rell gains @spell.RellW_Dismount:MountedMoveSpeed@ Move Speed while mounted.

Active - Ferromancy: Crash Down: Rell leaps off her mount, Knocking Up enemies and dealing @spell.RellW_Dismount:DismountDamage@ magic damage. Rell gains @spell.RellW_Dismount:Shield@ Shield, which lasts until she remounts.

Rell then enters her armored form, gaining @spell.RellW_Dismount:ResistanceIncrease*100@% increased Armor and Magic Resist, @spell.RellW_Dismount:DismountedASBoost*100@% Attack Speed and @spell.RellW_Dismount:DismountedRangeBoost@ Attack Range. In this armored form, she can use Ferromancy: Mount Up.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Full Tilt
spells.description:
Passive: Rell gains out of combat Move Speed.

Active: Rell and an ally gain ramping Move Speed, doubled toward enemies and each other. Her next Attack explodes, dealing magic damage.
spells.dynamicDescription: Rell and an ally charge, gaining <speed>@MinMS*100@% Move Speed</speed>, increased to <speed>@MaxMS*100@%</speed> when facing enemy champions or each other for @Duration@ seconds. Rell's next Attack or <spellName>Shattering Strike</spellName> explodes in an area for <magicDamage>@MaxHealthDamageCalc@ max Health magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Magnet Storm
spells.description: Rell explodes in a magnetic fury, violently Pulling nearby enemies toward herself. Then Rell constantly Drags nearby enemies toward herself for a short while, dealing magic damage over time.
spells.dynamicDescription: Rell explodes in a magnetic fury, violently <status>Pulling</status> nearby enemies towards herself. Then Rell constantly <status>Drags</status> nearby enemies towards herself and deals <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage> over the next @Duration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
